mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comm (cboard_no, cboard_title, cboard_content, cboard_viewcnt, cboard_date, user_no, cboard_delete_chk, comm_big, comm_mid, comm_big2, comm_mid2, comm_update_date) VALUES (SEQ_BOARDFREE_NO.nextval, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 300, 20, null, null, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum rn ,a.* from (SELECT bc.*, nvl(cnt,0) creply_cnt,u.user_name FROM BOARD_COMM bc, (SELECT CBOARD_NO, count(*) cnt FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY GROUP BY CBOARD_NO) bcr, users u WHERE bc.CBOARD_NO =bcr.CBOARD_NO(+) AND comm_big=300 AND comm_mid=20 AND bc.user_no = u.user_no order by cboard_date DESC) a) WHERE rn >= #{start} and rn <=#{end}
